alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:24PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms will impact portions of Laramie County through 600 PM MDT... At 523 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds associated with thunderstorms across Colorado. Movement was north at 45 to 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Pine Bluffs, Burns, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Federal, Crystal Lake Reservoir, Crystal Lake Campground, Granite Springs Reservoir, Ranchettes, Granite Springs Campground, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, North Cheyenne, Horse Creek, Warren Af Base, Carpenter, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 0 and 29. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 338 and 401. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
